<< getavailablelanguages Localization functions getlanguage >>

getdefaultlanguage

Returns the default language used in Nelson.

Syntax

lang = getdefaultlanguage()

Output argument

lang

a string: 'en_US' by default.

Description

getdefaultlanguage returns the default language used by Nelson.

Example

getdefaultlanguage()

See also

setlanguage.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
